Notepub
URL: https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/
Description: Declarative engine and docs site for building websites and documentation from Markdown.
Version: 0.1.1
Last-Updated: 2026-02-10

Primary language: English
Additional language: Russian

Start here:
- Home (EN): https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/en/
- Home (RU): https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/ru/
- Docs hub (EN): https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/en/docs
- Docs hub (RU): https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/ru/docs

High-value docs:
- Getting started (EN): https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/en/docs/getting-started
- Configuration (EN): https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/en/docs/configuration
- Rules reference (EN): https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/en/docs/rules-yaml
- Commands (EN): https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/en/docs/commands
- Build and deploy (EN): https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/en/docs/build-and-deploy

Machine-readable resources:
- Sitemap: https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/sitemap.xml
- Robots: https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/robots.txt

For larger context and section map, see:
- https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/llms-full.txt
